title: WisdomTree U.S. MidCap Fund (EZM) Shares Cross Above 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the WisdomTree U.S. MidCap Fund ETF (Symbol: EZM) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $38.70, changing hands as high as $39.01 per share. WisdomTree U.S. MidCap Fund shares are currently trading up about 2.5% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of EZM shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, EZM's low point in its 52 week range is $32.19 per share, with $42.4077 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $39.01.
